ygData.subject: 40 (was: RE: Re: Re: Grrrrrrrr!)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Solusek B, Pool room.  The night before my flight home from school, I spent about 12 hours straight here and got 3 bubbles worth of 40 experience.  Granted
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, 27 Dec 1999 kim@... wrote:

> > p.s. Yes! I dinged 40 in that camp! Woo hoo!
> I've spent 2 months in 40, and have finally entered that last
> bubble. Welcome to Hell. :-)

Solusek B, Pool room. The night before my flight home from school, I
spent about 12 hours straight here and got 3 bubbles worth of 40
experience. Granted it was a four man party operating in a near-deserted
zone, but it's a great spot for experience nonetheless. Cazic-Thule
groups will usually run a line policy, which is a bit of an annoyance, but
if you can find something else to do in the meantime, it can be
worthwhile.

Athren Notechaser, 41 and counting
